name: Pirates: At the turning Point
description:
Ahoi, oh mighty Piratelord! 

We're thrilled of your arriving since we really need your help! Hostile pirates have found our hideout and try to destroy it. You need to destroy their ships by rotating the water with the "a" and "d" keys.

This game is made for the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme of this jam was: Rotation

Made by: Tom, Luca, Finn and Marco
